about_the_game:
Upgrade your experience with the Official Manchester City FC Pack. Pick from a selection of exclusive kit from branded gloves to soccer balls. To top it off, experience heading drills in the mighty Etihad Stadium.

Included
Play Heading drills in the Etihad Stadium, home of Manchester City FC.
10 new pieces of official kit including all gloves, soccer balls and basketballs.
Swap UI to Manchester City brand colors.
Man City branded skin and colors for the gym environment.
detailed_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or equivalent

short_description: Upgrade your experience with the Official Manchester City FC Pack. Pick from a selection of kit from branded gloves to exclusive soccer balls. To top it off, experience heading drills in the mighty Etihad Stadium!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
